title: Detroit Tigers average ticket price 2006 to 2019
yAxis: Average ticket price in U.S. dollars
summary: Overall Average ticket price in U.S. dollars has increased over the Year.

Average ticket price in U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2008 to 2009, slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2010 and 2011.
Maximum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars, about 31.0 was reported at Year 2012
Minimum Average ticket price in U.S. dollars about 23.48 was reached at Year 2010
